message: We have started talking about this on convore with Sam https://convore.com/kynetx/awesome-app/1315931/
With the release of the Mozilla javascript parser api it might be time to think about it seriously : http://blog.mozilla.com/dherman/2011/06/28/the-js-parser-api-has-landed/
Kynetx.screenshot would be a wrapper around FF, chrome native functions
the idea is to create a crossbrowser library that could do advanced things on the browser side

why not create a KBX with hooks so we could extend it with other extensions ( actually I don't know if extensions can talk to each other but let's imagine they can do that . let's also imagine they can oauth each other) ?
are there any volunteers to start that library with me ? Any recommendations from the kynetx team?
